item.title: Designing a URL Shortening service like TinyURL
item.description: Why do we need URLs shortening? URL shortening is used to create shorter aliases for long URLs. We call these shortened aliases “short links”. Users are redirected to the original URLs when they hit those short links. Short links save a lot of space when displayed, printed, messaged, tweeted. Additionally, users are less likely to mistype shorter URLs. The shortened URL is nearly one-third of the size of the actual URL.
